name: Recipe: Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns.

value.name: Raw Meat
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

value.name: Flour
value.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

value.name: Cabbage
value.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

value.name: Jueyun Chili
value.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

value.name: Chili-Mince Cornbread Buns
value.desc: A traditional snack from Liyue. The fresh dough is turned out into a round, rested, and then placed inside a cage to steam. The meat and vegetables are then washed and diced, before being fried quickly in an oiled wok. When eaten, the fried condiments must be placed into the empty space in the middle of the buns before they are eaten together. Between the crisp vegetables and the flavorful meat, this is solid, great flavor.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from the Event Quest "Three to Get Ready, and Here We Go" (Only available during the Moonlight Merriment Event in Version 2.1)</color>
